title: Bronze.
body:
Hi I am an Lee Sin main In Bronze III who has been playing League since S3{{champion:64}} .
Yeah. Your'e probably gonna think, " This guy is sh*t as, there are no good lower Elo Lee Sin's", but I consider myself as a very good Lee Sin player who knows all the tricks. I've dominated games, sometimes going up to 15/0 while still having good farm and generally just being able to split, and work appropriately In team fights. Unfortunately ( Yes this sounds Cliche ) Nearly every game I will get a lane that will feed so hard that the enemy Team will just snowball out of control. Help :(

replies.body: I'm no great player or mathematician but if you take 15 kills divided by 3 lanes it would = 5 kills per lane ahead in your teams favor - pretty sure you could win that game... maybe you should stop taking the kills and trying to carry from a jungle support role, and maybe try supporting the team to get in a position to win there lanes..?
the other team is equally likely to have a bad player as yours. the only common factor you have in every game is yourself.
Pick a champ that's able to hard carry games not just stomp early and not be able to transition that lead into late game.

If you are consistently doing good with lee sin then you should be able to get out of bronze eventually. 

Also if one of your lanes isn't doing good then you should try and focus on getting the other lanes fed. It doesn't matter if your bot adc fed the enemy 6 kills in the first 5 minutes if you have a fed Zed and Renekton who can just go in there and burst them down in 3 seconds with the help of a well positioned Lee sin Ult :)
